General.Name: Jia Jie Biomedical Co Ltd
General.Description: Jia Jie Biomedical Co., Ltd. engages in the soft-shelled turtle food processing, manufacturing, sales, and trading business in Taiwan and Mainland China. The company is also involved in the dairy products manufacturing, miscellaneous food manufacturing, such as turtle egg powder capsules, enzyme powder, tortoise ointment, and soft-shelled turtle oil; import and export trade business; and distribution, bidding, quotation, and other businesses. In addition, it engages in the beverage, candy, bakery and supplementary food, and cosmetics wholesale business; water purification equipment and related parts production; and life insurance and product insurance brokerage. The company was formerly known as Murad Chia Jei Biotechnology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jia Jie Biomedical Co., Ltd. in June 2019. Jia Jie Biomedical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
